comment._content: Folk often ask me how I am. I often reply "TOWER BRIDGE". I meaning that lifie's full of ups and downs - sometimes ok sometimes not. They look puzzled until I explain.  And today?? AH TOWER BRIDGE.

comment._content: I love the photographer's name - Sidney Beer.  Sounds like an Australian lager!

comment.author: 48094458@N00
comment._content: I wondered what this is printed on.  On closer examination Beer painted photo chemicals on heavy paper, 8x10, same as the glass plate negative.   The image has held up well- great detail.
